Blog.post: well, i took a big step, and finally sent the e-mail i had been reading, writing, re-writing, deleting, writing again, on & on... anyway, i sent it yesterday, and he wrote back immediately, and he was happy? amazed? stunned into silence? it's hard to say, he can be so obtuse. he wrote of my soul poetry (which is touching and sooo sweet) and of sharing it with me again. i don't know what to think, so ya know what?! i'm not going to , i have to live in the moment, i need only be, i need only be, i need only to be "be here now" -Ram Dass

today........i just need somewhere to write. I'm thinking that maybe if i write all of these thoughts down i can get them out of my head and get on with it, life i mean, get on with life. I am 33 years old, this is really hard for me to believe. When i was little it seemed that one day you realize you're an adult, and that day you start feeling like one, but i feel the same. Probably everyone does i don't know i haven't asked. Anyway, I'm married, I have 2 little girls, a cat, a job, a yard. So, i find myself thinking 'is this it?, is this what i waited my whole life for? i thought it would be so much more, more exciting, more fun, more friends, more everything. i sound dissappoinited, don't i? i do. i am. it is only my fault, i chose, or didn't choose and just let things happen, some of both, either way, it's all up to me, always has been...somehow i just didn't know that. An old boyfriend of mine from a long time ago has been calling me quite alot lately and this ,....i don't even know what to say about it. i still really really love him. that's all i can say ........
